1.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Phoebe and Monica are there as Joey is entering excitedly.

lines.Line: Hey! You guys! You’re not gonna believe this! I just got off theNEWLINEphone with my agent

Okay. I got nominated for my part on Days of Our Lives

No! I’m up for a Soapie

Thank you! Well, I guess now I know who I’m taking to the awards.NEWLINE(Points to Rachel.
Oh, stop that! Don’t kid about that! (Gasps) Will all the stars beNEWLINEthere
Oh my God! Oh my God! I can’t go! I’m gonna be too nervous
No!! You are getting married! This is all I have

2.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Monica and Phoebe are drinking coffee and Phoebe notices a cuteNEWLINEguy checking them out.

lines.Line: Oh my God! That guy at the counter is totally checking you out
Really? (Looks.) My God, he’s really cute

I’m just saying, get his number just in case. But no: Chandler is inNEWLINEan accident and can’t perform sexually and he would want you to take a lover toNEWLINEsatisfy the needs that he can no longer fulfill
Op, can I just tell you something? Very flattered but umm, I’mNEWLINEengaged. (Points to her ring.
Wow! Uh, this is kind of embarrassing. I was actually coming over toNEWLINEtalk to your friend
(To Phoebe) I thought you knew I was looking at you
(To Phoebe) I thought you knew I was looking at you
I did, but that was really fun
I did, but that was really fun

3.SceneDescription: Monica’s Restaurant Kitchen, she’s cooking as Phoebe enters.

lines.Line: Hey! How’d your date go with Jake
Oh, great! We couldn’t keep our eyes off each other all night andNEWLINEthen every once and a while y’know, he’d kinda lean over and stroke my hair andNEWLINEtouch my neck. (Does that to Monica.
Okay, stop it Phoebe, you’re getting me all tingly
Okay, stop it Phoebe, you’re getting me all tingly
(laughs) All I could think of was y’know, Is he gonna kissNEWLINEme? Is he gonna kiss me
I’m a lady Monica, I don’t kiss and tell. But this hickeyNEWLINEspeaks for itself. (She starts to open up her blouse.
Okay-okay, I got it. I got it
Okay-okay, I got it. I got it
I just like him so much that I just feel like I’ve had 10 drinksNEWLINEtoday and I’ve only had six
Oh, I haven’t had that feeling since I first started going out withNEWLINEChandler. Wow, I’m never gonna have that feeling again, am I

No, a guy would be saying, I’m never gonna get to sleep withNEWLINEanyone else. Oh my God! I’m never gonna get to sleep with anyone else!NEWLINEI’ve been so busy planning the wedding that I forgot about all the things thatNEWLINEI’d be giving up! I mean, I…I’m never gonna have a first kiss again

4.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Phoebe is saying good-bye to her boyfriend Jake at the door toNEWLINECentral Perk.

lines.Line: All right. Bye. (Backs out the door.
Bye! (Phoebe goes over and joins Monica on the couch.) We said good-byeNEWLINEat the door so as not to flaunt our new love
Phoebe, it’s okay. You don’t have to tip toe around me.NEWLINEI-I’ve been thinking about it and umm, y’know what? I’m okay about notNEWLINEhaving that new relationship feeling
(yelling through the window to Phoebe) I miss you already!
(yelling through the window to Phoebe) I miss you already!
(yelling back) I miss you too!!!! (He walks away.
(yelling back) I miss you too!!!! (He walks away.

See? That’s what I mean. I mean that, that’s great! ButNEWLINEI wouldn’t trade in what I have for that. I mean I’m gonna be with Chandler forNEWLINEthe rest of my life, and that’s what makes me happy. (Chandler approaches.) HeyNEWLINEsweetie, come here! Come sit down. Hey Phoebe and I were just talking about how ourNEWLINErelationship is deep and meaningful. It really is, don’t you think
Oh totally! (Holds up his finger.) Pull my finger
Oh totally! (Holds up his finger.) Pull my finger

5.SceneDescription: The 2001 Soapie Awards, the announcer is introducing the next presenter.

lines.Line: Presenting the award for Favorite Supporting Actress is Joey TribbianiNEWLINEfrom Days of Our Lives. (Applause as Joey angrily walks to the podium and eyes theNEWLINEtrophy.

(angrily and monotone) Any one of the brilliant actresses nominated forNEWLINEthis award tonight deserves to take it home. Unfortunately only one can. (Shakes his headNEWLINEin disgust.) The nominees for Best Supporting Actress are: from Passions: Erin Goff.NEWLINE(There is applause, which Joey disgustedly waits to die out.) From One Life to Live:NEWLINEMary Loren Bishop (They start to applaud again, but Joey interrupts in with the rest ofNEWLINEthe nominees), from All My Children: Sarah McCann, and from Days of Our Lives:NEWLINEJessica Ashley. And the winner is…(Opens the envelope)…Jessica Ashley from DaysNEWLINEof Our Lives. (Applause) Uh, unfortunately Jessica couldn’t be with us tonight, soNEWLINEI’ll be accepting this award on her behalf. (Realizes something) And I’m sureNEWLINEthat Jessica would like to thank my parents who always believed in me. She’d alsoNEWLINElike to thank my friends, Chandler, Monica, Ross, Phoebe, and Rachel, who’sNEWLINEsittin’ right there! (Points at Rachel.) (The music starts and his microphone isNEWLINEturned off; this angers Joey again and he disgustedly exits.

6.SceneDescription: Ross’s Classroom, he is writing on the board and Alan is coming in to seeNEWLINEhim.

lines.Line: (turning towards him) Yes Mr. Lewis, how can I help you
I know I didn’t do well on my midterms and stuff but, I was kindaNEWLINEhoping you could change my grade
And why exactly would I do that? (Goes back to writing on the board.
And why exactly would I do that? (Goes back to writing on the board.
Because I’m in love with you
Because I’m in love with you
(turning around and dragging the chalk down the board) What?
Yeah, I’m all…in love with you and stuff. So could you changeNEWLINEmy grade
Yeah, I’m all…in love with you and stuff. So could you changeNEWLINEmy grade
Well why not? You changed Ned’s grade
Well that’s different! Okay? Because he, he was actually in love withNEWLINEme
No he’s not! He’s totally yanking your chain! He’s doneNEWLINEthis with three other teachers
I can’t believe someone would do that for a grade
I know! It’s awful. I love you
I know! It’s awful. I love you

7.SceneDescription: Silvercup Studios, Joey and Rachel are there to give Jessica her award.

lines.Line: I cannot believe I’m gonna meet Jessica Ashley
Okay wait-wait p-please be cool! Okay? I work with this woman
Okay, I’m totally cool! (She coolly knocks on the door
Okay, I’m totally cool! (She coolly knocks on the door
Ah, this is my friend Rachel
Ah, this is my friend Rachel
Uh listen, here’s your Soapie. I accepted it for ya. (Hands it toNEWLINEher.
(shocked) Oh my God! I won! Do you have any idea what thisNEWLINEmeans?! (She rolls her eyes and throws it onto the couch.
Well, that-that-that’s it? You’re gonna, you’re gonna putNEWLINEit on your shelf or anything
Well, that-that-that’s it? You’re gonna, you’re gonna putNEWLINEit on your shelf or anything
No, I try to save that for real awards. Now, if you’llNEWLINEexcuse me. (She exits.
Y-y-yeah! (As they start to leave, Rachel pauses and steals a vase withNEWLINEflowers in it.) Yeah you do. (They exit.

8.SceneDescription: Ross’s classroom, he has just finished his lecture and the students areNEWLINEfiling out.

lines.Line: Uh Mr. Morse, can I speak to you for a moment
(walking up) That was a great lecture today. Did you get a little hairNEWLINEcut
Uh-hmm, yeah-yeah do you like it? Do-do you looove it? I just want you toNEWLINEknow that I’m changing your grade back
‘Cause I know what you’re trying to pull here. Okay? It’sNEWLINEnot gonna work
I’m not trying to pull anything. Look, I love you dude
I’m not trying to pull anything. Look, I love you dude

Y’know what? I-I’m not even gonna talk about this. Okay? ThisNEWLINElittle thing is over. I know you have a girlfriend! Okay—(Ned looksNEWLINEshocked)—Yeah! And I know about the other professors! How do you think that makes meNEWLINEfeel, Ned?! You used me! You don’t love me and you never did! (Ross turns around toNEWLINEmake a grand exit but runs into two colleagues.) Ah Professor Winston, ProfessorNEWLINEFredrickson, I’ll be right with you. (To Ned) Don’t make this worse andNEWLINEI’ll give you a C. (To the professors) Shall we? (They leave.
